titles.title: O, That There Were Such A Heart In Them

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Oh that there were such a heart in men
That they would fear Me,
And keep all My commandments always;
That it might be well with them
And with their children forever,
Oh that there were such a heart in men!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ye shall walk in all the ways
That the Lord your God has commanded you,
That ye may live, that it might be well with you;
That it may prolong your days
In the land that ye shall possess,
Oh that there were such a heart in men!
